snippet: Pope Francis directed the Vatican to act decisively on sexual abuse cases and to punish pedophile priests, saying the Roman Catholic Church’s credibility was on the line.
abstract: Pope Francis directs Vatican to act decisively on sexual abuse cases and to punish pedophile priests, saying Roman Catholic Church’s credibility is at stake.
lead_paragraph: Pope Francis directed the Vatican to act decisively on sexual abuse cases and to punish pedophile priests, saying the Roman Catholic Church’s credibility was on the line.

headline.seo: Pope Seeks Decisive Action to Resolve Sexual Abuse Cases
headline.main: The Vatican: Pope Seeks Decisive Action to Resolve Church’s Sexual Abuse Cases
headline.print_headline: The Vatican: Pope Seeks Decisive Action To Resolve Church’s Sexual Abuse Cases
